journal reviews books about connect submit



be without be without be without [ii]

by Faye Chevalier on March 19, 2016




(now) amid
falling blackbirds

and seeming-flights
        from my mother’s car
        to the garage door,

i will not recall
whether        i walked

        or crawled.





be without be without be without [ii] - March 19, 2016 -
